text: Platypterocarpus is a genus of plants in the family Celastraceae. It contains a single species, Platypterocarpus tanganyikensis , endemic to Tanzania. ==References== Category:Celastraceae Category:Celastrales genera Category:Monotypic rosid genera Category:Afromontane flora Category:Endemic flora of Tanzania Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Platypterocarpus
